short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start each new tab with motivational and iconic quotes from your favorite animes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your browsing experience with Anime Quotes. Start each new tab with wisdom and inspiration from your favorite anime characters and series. With this extension, every time you open a new tab you’ll begin your browsing journey with a quote from the world of anime, carefully selected to uplift your spirits and motivate you to tackle the day. 

⦿⦿⦿ Features ⦿⦿⦿

⦿ Iconic Quotes: Experience a diverse collection of quotes sourced from the following animes: Naruto, One Piece, Haikyu!!, Demon Slayer, and Attack on Titan.

⦿ Daily Inspiration: Begin each browsing session with a fresh dose of anime wisdom, as the extension randomly selects a new quote for every new tab.

⦿ Simple and Lightweight: The extension seamlessly integrates into your Chrome browser without any additional clutter or distractions, ensuring a smooth browsing experience.

⦿ Offline Access: Access quotes even when offline, ensuring uninterrupted anime content.

⦿ Completely Free: Enjoy the benefits of daily anime quotes without any cost to you. There are no hidden fees or subscriptions, making it accessible to all users.

⦿⦿⦿ Upcoming Features ⦿⦿⦿

⦿ More Quotes: Upgrading our collection to include quotes from more animes. If you’d like to see a particular anime, send us an email with what you’d like to see!

⦿ More Backgrounds: Upgrading our collection to include backgrounds from more animes. If you’d like to see a particular anime, send us an email with what you’d like to see!

⦿ Standard Time Toggle: Toggle between a 12 hour clock or a 24 hour clock.

⦿ Japanese Toggle: Choose to toggle the Japanese version of the quote to explore deeper meanings.
